briefTitle: Efficacy of Transdermal Fentanyl Patches in Relief of Acute Postoperative Pain After Mastectomy
officialTitle: Efficacy of Transdermal Fentanyl Patches in Relief of Acute Postoperative Pain After Mastectomy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Total dose of morphine consumption in the first 48 hours postoperative
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* ASA I - II patients
* aged 30-60 years
* body weight ranged between 65-10kg

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with history of allergy to morphine
* chronic intake of analgesics or non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug 24 h prior to surgery,
* there was a history of a psychiatric disorder patients weight was less then 50kg.
* impaired kidney function.
